scripts.copy:assets: rimraf dist && mkdir dist && cp ../dashbuilder/dashbuilder-authoring/target/dashbuilder-authoring.war ./dist && cp ../dashbuilder/dashbuilder-runtime-parent/dashbuilder-runtime-app/target/dashbuilder-runtime-app-runner.jar ./dist
scripts.podman:build:authoring:
yarn run run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build $(echo $(build-env dashbuilder.baseImage.buildTags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env dashbuilder.baseImage.registry)/$(build-env dashbuilder.baseImage.account)/$(build-env dashbuilder.baseImage.authoringName):%s
" | xargs echo) -f ContainerFile.DashBuilderAuthoring" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
scripts.podman:build:runtime:
yarn run run-script-if --bool $([ $(command -v podman) ] && echo true || echo false) --then "podman build $(echo $(build-env dashbuilder.baseImage.buildTags) | xargs printf -- "-t $(build-env dashbuilder.baseImage.registry)/$(build-env dashbuilder.baseImage.account)/$(build-env dashbuilder.baseImage.runtimeName):%s
" | xargs echo) -f ContainerFile.DashBuilderRuntime" --else "echo Podman not found, skipping image build."
scripts.build:prod:linux: yarn cleanup && yarn copy:assets && yarn podman:build:runtime && yarn podman:build:authoring
